nodes.text: The Travaless case was a trial that the Lorrdian lawyer Sardonne Sardon won sometime before 43 ABY. Famed lawyer Eramuth Bwua'tu was impressed with Sardon's work in the case, particularly in gaining an acquittal by arguing that the female defendant was suffering delusions when she stole the speeder, and proving successfully that the crazed defendant genuinely thought she had purchased the speeder.
